dc:title: Technique of Agitation
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Distinguishes The Catholic Worker from other news publications: "The purpose of a paper is to influence the thought of its readers. We are quite frankly propagandists for Catholic Action."
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 198 1933-12-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
